articles.description: The changes could make it harder for spammers to land in your inbox.
articles.content:
Key Takeaways
  • Google is implementing changes to Gmail to combat spam, including requiring bulk emailers to authenticate their emails, reducing malicious emails by 75%.
  • Bulk sender… [+2422 chars]
